update.description:
This started out as a simple implementation of wireframe rendering, and then became complicated when I started writing a test for it. The crux of the problem centered around creating multiple render contexts in the same process. I didn't quite solve this problem, but made some solid advances in that direction and fixed a few bugs along the way. 

So, there is now a MainWindow_TEST that can be used to test various aspects of the GUI main window. It's primary limitation is that the test cannot be used with a world that requires and off-screen render buffer.
update.title: Allow rendering of models in wireframe.

content.raw:
Here's my results. Both are really close to passing; probably just adjust the thresholds. We'll want to see how the thresholds work with Jenkins, because it tends to be different from our desktops.
~~~
Dbg AvgPrewireframe [103.698] AvgPostWireframe[93.9451]
103.698 93.9451
FAIL!  : MainWindow_TEST::Wireframe() 'fabs(avgPreWireframe - avgPostWireframe) > 10' returned FALSE. ()
   Loc: [/home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo_wireframe/gazebo/gui/MainWindow_TEST.cc(127)]
SharePercentChange[1.05902] ShareMaxPercentChange[1]
ResPercentChange[2.76631]ResMaxPercentChange[4]
FAIL!  : MainWindow_TEST::Wireframe() 'sharePercentChange < this->shareMaxPercentChange' returned FALSE. ()
   Loc: [/home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo_wireframe/gazebo/gui/QTestFixture.cc(146)]
PASS   : MainWindow_TEST::cleanupTestCase()
Totals: 2 passed, 2 failed, 0 skipped
********* Finished testing of MainWindow_TEST *********
~~~
content.html:
Here's my results. Both are really close to passing; probably just adjust the thresholds. We'll want to see how the thresholds work with Jenkins, because it tends to be different from our desktops.

103.698 93.9451
FAIL!  : MainWindow_TEST::Wireframe() 'fabs(avgPreWireframe - avgPostWireframe) > 10' returned FALSE. ()
   Loc: [/home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo_wireframe/gazebo/gui/MainWindow_TEST.cc(127)]

ResPercentChange[2.76631]ResMaxPercentChange[4]
FAIL!  : MainWindow_TEST::Wireframe() 'sharePercentChange < this->shareMaxPercentChange' returned FALSE. ()
   Loc: [/home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo_wireframe/gazebo/gui/QTestFixture.cc(146)]
PASS   : MainWindow_TEST::cleanupTestCase()
